flags.alt: A bandeira da Cidade do Vaticano é quadrada, composta por duas faixas verticais iguais, amarela e branca, com o brasão papal ao centro da faixa branca.
A bandeira da Bélgica é composta por três faixas verticais iguais: preto, amarelo e vermelho.
A bandeira das Comores tem quatro faixas horizontais amarelo, branco, vermelho e azul, com um triângulo verde contendo uma lua crescente e quatro estrelas.
A bandeira de Porto Rico tem cinco faixas horizontais vermelhas e brancas e um triângulo azul com uma estrela branca.

spa.official: Estado Libre Asociado de Puerto Rico

flags.alt: A bandeira das Ilhas Menores Distantes dos EUA segue o padrão da bandeira dos Estados Unidos.

name.common: Ilhas Menores Distantes dos Estados Unidos
name.official: Ilhas Menores Distantes dos Estados Unidos

flags.alt: A bandeira da Ilha Bouvet segue o padrão da bandeira da Noruega.
A bandeira da Tanzânia tem uma faixa diagonal preta com bordas amarelas, separando áreas verde e azul.
A bandeira da Macedónia do Norte tem um sol amarelo com oito raios sobre fundo vermelho.
A bandeira da Arábia Saudita é verde com a Shahada em branco e uma espada horizontal.
A bandeira da Ilha do Natal tem triângulos verde e azul com símbolos locais.
A bandeira da Eslováquia tem faixas branca, azul e vermelha com o brasão nacional.
A bandeira da Coreia do Norte tem faixas azul, branca e vermelha com uma estrela vermelha.
A bandeira de Svalbard e Jan Mayen segue o padrão norueguês.
A bandeira da República Centro-Africana tem faixas azul, branca, verde e amarela com uma faixa vertical vermelha.
A bandeira da Zâmbia é verde com uma águia laranja e três faixas verticais.
A bandeira da Jamaica tem um X dourado separando áreas verdes e pretas.
A bandeira das Filipinas tem faixas azul e vermelha e um triângulo branco com sol e estrelas.
A bandeira de Montenegro tem fundo vermelho com brasão dourado ao centro.
A bandeira do Chile tem faixas branca e vermelha com um quadrado azul e estrela branca.
A bandeira de Omã tem uma faixa vertical vermelha e três horizontais branca, vermelha e verde.
A bandeira da Arménia tem três faixas horizontais vermelha, azul e laranja.
A bandeira do Paquistão tem uma faixa branca e um campo verde com lua e estrela.
A bandeira de Tokelau mostra uma canoa amarela e a constelação Cruzeiro do Sul.
A bandeira do Benim tem uma faixa vertical verde e duas horizontais amarela e vermelha.
A bandeira de Saint Pierre e Miquelon apresenta um navio amarelo de três mastros sobre um fundo azul com linhas onduladas brancas. À esquerda, um painel vertical exibe três brasões heráldicos.
A bandeira da Costa Rica tem cinco faixas horizontais azul, branco, vermelho, branco e azul, com o brasão nacional num disco branco à esquerda da faixa vermelha.
A bandeira de Guernsey é branca com uma cruz vermelha e, sobre ela, uma cruz dourada de braços iguais.
A bandeira das Ilhas Virgens Britânicas é azul com a bandeira do Reino Unido no canto e o brasão local à direita.
A bandeira do Suriname tem cinco faixas horizontais verde, branco, vermelho, branco e verde, com uma estrela amarela ao centro.
A bandeira da Hungria tem três faixas horizontais iguais: vermelho, branco e verde.
A bandeira dos Países Baixos tem três faixas horizontais iguais: vermelho, branco e azul.
A bandeira do Uzbequistão tem faixas azul, branca e verde com bordas vermelhas, uma lua crescente e doze estrelas.
A bandeira da Eritreia tem três triângulos coloridos e um ramo de oliveira dourado dentro de uma coroa.
A bandeira da Serra Leoa tem três faixas horizontais verde, branca e azul.
A bandeira do Kuwait tem faixas verde, branca e vermelha com um trapézio preto à esquerda.
A bandeira do Butão tem um dragão branco sobre campos amarelo e laranja.
A bandeira das Bermudas é vermelha com a Union Jack e o brasão local.
A bandeira de Chipre mostra o mapa da ilha em cobre sobre dois ramos de oliveira.
A bandeira de França tem três faixas verticais azul, branca e vermelha.
A bandeira da Polónia tem duas faixas horizontais branca e vermelha.
A bandeira da Áustria tem três faixas horizontais vermelha, branca e vermelha.
A bandeira do Liechtenstein tem faixas azul e vermelha com uma coroa dourada.
A bandeira do Camboja tem faixas azul e vermelha com Angkor Wat ao centro.

khm.official: ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា

flags.alt: A bandeira de São Cristóvão e Neves tem duas estrelas brancas numa faixa diagonal preta com bordas amarelas.

name.official: Federação de São Cristóvão e Neves

eng.official: Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis

flags.alt: A bandeira de Santa Lúcia tem fundo azul claro com dois triângulos sobrepostos.
A bandeira de Granada tem triângulos verdes e amarelos, estrelas vermelhas e uma noz-moscada.
A bandeira da Alemanha tem três faixas horizontais preta, vermelha e dourada.
A bandeira da Guiné tem três faixas verticais vermelha, amarela e verde.
A bandeira da Índia tem faixas açafrão, branca e verde com a roda Ashoka ao centro.
A bandeira da Guiné Equatorial tem três faixas horizontais verde, branca e vermelha, com o brasão ao centro e um triângulo azul à esquerda.
A bandeira do Sudão tem faixas horizontais vermelha, branca e preta, com um triângulo verde à esquerda.
A bandeira do Djibuti tem faixas azul e verde com um triângulo branco contendo uma estrela vermelha.
A bandeira da Dinamarca é vermelha com uma cruz branca deslocada para a esquerda.
A bandeira da Suécia é azul com uma cruz amarela deslocada para a esquerda.
A bandeira da Venezuela tem faixas amarela, azul e vermelha com oito estrelas brancas em arco.
A bandeira da Líbia tem faixas vermelha, preta e verde com uma lua crescente e estrela brancas.
A bandeira dos Países Baixos Caribenhos tem triângulos azul e amarelo separados por uma faixa branca com uma estrela vermelha dentro de uma rosa-dos-ventos.
A bandeira da Guatemala tem faixas azul-claro e branca com o brasão ao centro.
A bandeira dos Emirados Árabes Unidos tem uma faixa vertical vermelha e três horizontais verde, branca e preta.
A bandeira do Laos tem faixas vermelha, azul e vermelha com um círculo branco ao centro.

lao.official: ສາທາລະນະ ຊາທິປະໄຕ ຄົນລາວ ຂອງ

flags.alt: A bandeira do Bangladesh é verde com um círculo vermelho ligeiramente deslocado para a esquerda.
A bandeira de Tuvalu é azul-clara com a Union Jack e nove estrelas amarelas representando as ilhas.
A bandeira da Albânia é vermelha com uma águia negra de duas cabeças ao centro.
A bandeira de Essuatíni tem faixas azul e vermelha com um escudo Nguni e lanças ao centro.
A bandeira do Iémen tem faixas horizontais vermelha, branca e preta.
A bandeira das Ilhas Cocos (Keeling) é verde com uma palmeira, uma lua crescente e a constelação Cruzeiro do Sul.
A bandeira de Montserrat é azul com a Union Jack e o brasão local mostrando uma mulher com uma harpa e uma cruz.
A bandeira de Angola tem faixas vermelha e preta com uma estrela, uma catana e uma roda dentada amarelas.
A bandeira do Ruanda tem faixas azul, amarela e verde com um sol amarelo no canto superior direito.
A bandeira da República Democrática do Congo é azul com uma faixa diagonal vermelha e uma estrela amarela.
A bandeira de Trindade e Tobago é vermelha com uma faixa diagonal preta com bordas brancas.
A bandeira da Ucrânia tem duas faixas horizontais azul e amarela.
A bandeira do Togo tem cinco faixas horizontais verdes e amarelas, com um quadrado vermelho contendo uma estrela branca no canto superior esquerdo.
A bandeira da Lituânia tem três faixas horizontais iguais: amarelo, verde e vermelho.
A bandeira do Bahrein é vermelha com uma faixa branca serrilhada à esquerda formada por cinco triângulos.
A bandeira de Hong Kong é vermelha com uma flor branca de Bauhinia de cinco pétalas ao centro, cada uma com uma pequena estrela vermelha.

name.official: Região Administrativa Especial de Hong Kong da República Popular da China

eng.official: Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China

zho.official: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区

flags.alt: A bandeira de Barbados tem três faixas verticais azul, dourado e azul, com um tridente preto ao centro.
A bandeira de Portugal tem duas faixas verticais verde e vermelha, com o brasão nacional ao centro.
A bandeira de Israel é branca com duas faixas azuis e a Estrela de David azul ao centro.
A bandeira de São Tomé e Príncipe tem faixas verdes e amarelas, duas estrelas pretas e um triângulo vermelho à esquerda.

name.official: República Democrática de São Tomé e Príncipe

por.official: República Democrática do São Tomé e Príncipe

flags.alt: A bandeira da Roménia tem três faixas verticais azul, amarela e vermelha.
A bandeira de Guam é azul com uma borda vermelha e um emblema oval com uma cena de praia.
A bandeira de Tonga é vermelha com um retângulo branco contendo uma cruz vermelha no canto superior esquerdo.
A bandeira da Gâmbia tem faixas vermelha, azul e verde separadas por linhas brancas.
A bandeira do Níger tem faixas laranja, branca e verde com um círculo laranja ao centro.
A bandeira de Taiwan é vermelha com um retângulo azul contendo um sol branco de 12 raios.
A bandeira da Ilha Norfolk tem faixas verdes e brancas com um pinheiro nativo ao centro.
A bandeira do Iraque tem faixas vermelha, branca e preta com inscrições árabes verdes ao centro.
A bandeira da Nova Zelândia é azul com a Union Jack e quatro estrelas vermelhas com bordas brancas representando o Cruzeiro do Sul.
A bandeira de Cuba tem faixas azuis e brancas com um triângulo vermelho contendo uma estrela branca.
A bandeira da Etiópia tem faixas verde, amarela e vermelha com o emblema nacional azul e amarelo ao centro.
A bandeira de Malta tem faixas verticais branca e vermelha com a Cruz de Jorge no canto superior esquerdo.
A bandeira de Madagáscar tem uma faixa vertical branca e duas horizontais vermelha e verde.
A bandeira da Bósnia e Herzegovina é azul com um triângulo amarelo e uma fileira de estrelas brancas.
A bandeira da Geórgia é branca com uma cruz vermelha e quatro cruzes menores nos cantos.
A bandeira da Nova Caledónia tem três faixas horizontais azul, vermelha e verde, com um disco amarelo contendo um símbolo tradicional.
A bandeira da Estónia tem três faixas horizontais iguais: azul, preto e branco.
A bandeira das Honduras tem faixas turquesa e branca com cinco estrelas turquesa ao centro.
A bandeira do Emirado Islâmico do Afeganistão é branca com a Shahada em preto ao centro.
A bandeira de Curaçau é azul com uma faixa amarela e duas estrelas brancas no canto superior esquerdo.
A bandeira do Haiti tem faixas azul e vermelha com o brasão ao centro.
A bandeira da Namíbia tem uma faixa diagonal vermelha com bordas brancas separando áreas azul e verde, e um sol dourado no canto superior esquerdo.
A bandeira das Ilhas Pitcairn é azul com a Union Jack e o brasão local ao centro.
A bandeira de São Vicente e Granadinas tem faixas azul, dourada e verde com três losangos verdes formando um V.
A bandeira da Guiné-Bissau tem uma faixa vertical vermelha com uma estrela preta e duas faixas horizontais amarela e verde.
A bandeira da Tailândia tem cinco faixas horizontais vermelha, branca, azul, branca e vermelha, sendo a azul dupla em altura.

tha.official: ราชอาณาจักรไทย

flags.alt: A bandeira do Cazaquistão é turquesa com um sol dourado e uma águia, além de um padrão ornamental dourado à esquerda.
A bandeira de São Bartolomeu mostra o brasão local sobre fundo branco, com elementos heráldicos e a palavra OUANALAO.
A bandeira do Uruguai tem faixas brancas e azuis e um sol amarelo com rosto humano.
A bandeira da Costa do Marfim tem três faixas verticais laranja, branca e verde.
A bandeira do Brasil é verde com um losango amarelo e um globo azul com estrelas e a faixa 'Ordem e Progresso'.
A bandeira da Mongólia tem faixas verticais vermelha, azul e vermelha, com o símbolo Soyombo em dourado.
A bandeira do Território Britânico do Oceano Índico é branca com listras azuis onduladas, a Union Jack e um coqueiro com coroa.
A bandeira da Letónia é vermelha com uma faixa horizontal branca ao centro.
A bandeira da Guiana tem triângulos vermelho e amarelo sobre um fundo verde com bordas pretas e brancas.
A bandeira da Polinésia Francesa tem faixas vermelhas e brancas com um disco central mostrando ondas, sol e uma canoa com cinco tripulantes.
A bandeira do Panamá tem quatro quadrantes com estrelas azul e vermelha e áreas vermelhas e azuis.
A bandeira de Jersey é branca com uma cruz diagonal vermelha e um escudo vermelho com três leões dourados e uma coroa amarela.
A bandeira do Mali tem três faixas verticais iguais: verde, amarela e vermelha.
A bandeira do Peru tem três faixas verticais vermelha, branca e vermelha, com o brasão ao centro.
A bandeira da Indonésia tem duas faixas horizontais iguais: vermelha e branca.
A bandeira de Mayotte tem fundo branco com o brasão ao centro, dois cavalos-marinhos e o nome do território em vermelho.
A bandeira da Moldávia tem três faixas verticais azul, amarela e vermelha com o brasão ao centro.
A bandeira da Síria tem faixas horizontais vermelha, branca e preta com duas estrelas verdes ao centro.
A bandeira de Singapura tem faixas vermelha e branca com uma lua crescente e cinco estrelas.
A bandeira das Ilhas Caimão é azul com a Union Jack e o brasão local ao centro.
A bandeira do Egito tem faixas vermelha, branca e preta com a águia dourada de Saladino ao centro.
A bandeira da Ilha Heard e Ilhas McDonald é azul com a Union Jack e estrelas brancas representando o Cruzeiro do Sul.
A bandeira das Maldivas é vermelha com um retângulo verde e uma lua crescente branca.
A bandeira de Timor-Leste é vermelha com triângulos preto e amarelo e uma estrela branca.
A bandeira da Jordânia tem faixas preta, branca e verde com um triângulo vermelho e uma estrela branca de sete pontas.
A bandeira da Somália é azul-clara com uma estrela branca de cinco pontas ao centro.
A bandeira do Azerbaijão tem faixas azul, vermelha e verde com uma lua crescente e uma estrela branca.
A bandeira de Moçambique tem faixas verde, preta e amarela com um triângulo vermelho contendo um livro, uma enxada e uma arma.
A bandeira de Cabo Verde tem faixas azuis, brancas e vermelhas com um círculo de dez estrelas amarelas.
A bandeira do Canadá tem faixas vermelhas e um quadrado branco com uma folha de ácer vermelha ao centro.
A bandeira da Ilha de Man é vermelha com um tríscele de três pernas ao centro.
A bandeira de Gibraltar tem faixas branca e vermelha com um castelo vermelho e uma chave dourada.
A bandeira da Coreia do Sul é branca com o símbolo Taegeuk ao centro e quatro trigramas pretos.
A bandeira da Nicarágua tem faixas azuis e branca com o brasão ao centro.
A bandeira da Bulgária tem faixas horizontais branca, verde e vermelha.
The flag of El Salvador is composed of three equal horizontal bands of cobalt blue, white and cobalt blue, with the national coat of arms centered in the white band.
The flag of Luxembourg is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, white and light blue.

The flag of the United States of America is composed of thirteen equal horizontal bands of red alternating with white. A blue rectangle, bearing fifty small five-pointed white stars arranged in nine rows where rows of six stars alternate with rows of five stars, is superimposed in the canton.
The flag of Colombia is composed of three horizontal bands of yellow, blue and red, with the yellow band twice the height of the other two bands.

The flag of Western Sahara has three equal horizontal stripes of black, white, and green overlaid by a red triangle issuing from the hoist. Centered in the white band is a red fly-facing crescent surrounding a red five-pointed star.

The flag of Australia has a dark blue field. It features the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton, beneath which is a large white seven-pointed star. A representation of the Southern Cross constellation, made up of one small five-pointed and four larger seven-pointed white stars, is situated on the fly side of the field.
The flag of Chad is composed of three equal vertical bands of blue, gold and red.

The flag of Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha is blue with the UK flag in the canton and the national coat of arms shield centered on the fly half. The upper third of the shield depicts a white plover, a native bird, on a yellow field. The rest of the shield depicts a rocky coastline and a three-masted sailing ship with sails furled and flying an English flag.

name.common: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
name.official: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

eng.official: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
eng.common: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

flags.alt: The flag of Turkey has a red field bearing a large fly-side facing white crescent and a smaller five-pointed white star placed just outside the crescent opening. The white crescent and star are offset slightly towards the hoist side of center.
The flag of Belize has a royal blue field with a thin red horizontal band at the top and bottom of the field and the national coat of arms in the center.
The flag of Ghana is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, gold and green, with a five-pointed black star centered in the gold band.
The flag of Saint Martin is composed of three equal vertical bands of blue, white and red.

The flag of Uganda is composed of six equal horizontal bands of black, yellow, red, black, yellow and red. A white circle bearing a hoist-side facing grey red-crested crane is superimposed in the center of the field.
The flag of Martinique consists of a red triangle at the hoist, with two horizontal bands, the upper green and the lower black.
The flag of Serbia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, blue and white. The coat of arms of Serbia is superimposed at the center of the field slightly towards the hoist side.

The flag of Malaysia is composed of fourteen equal horizontal bands of red alternating with white. A blue rectangle, bearing a fly-side facing yellow crescent and a fourteen-pointed yellow star placed just outside the crescent opening, is superimposed in the canton.
The flag of the Åland Islands has a blue field with a large golden-yellow-edged red cross that extends to the edges of the field. The vertical part of this cross is offset towards the hoist side.

The flag of Niue is yellow with the UK flag in the canton. The UK flag has five yellow five-pointed stars, with a large star on a blue disk in the center and smaller stars on each arm of the red cross.

The flag of Dominica has a green field with a large centered tricolor cross. The vertical and horizontal parts of the cross each comprise three bands of yellow, black and white. A red circle, bearing a hoist-side facing purple Sisserou parrot standing on a twig and encircled by ten five-pointed yellow-edged green stars, is superimposed at the center of the cross.
The flag of Ireland is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, white and orange.

The flag of the Falkland Islands is blue with the UK flag in the canton and the national coat of arms centered in the fly half. The coat of arms has a white ram above a ship, with a scroll at the bottom bearing the motto "DESIRE THE RIGHT."

The flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — has a blue field. It features the white-edged red cross of Saint George superimposed on the diagonal red cross of Saint Patrick which is superimposed on the diagonal white cross of Saint Andrew.

name.official: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

eng.official: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

flags.alt: The flag of the Dominican Republic is divided into four rectangles by a centered white cross that extends to the edges of the field and bears the national coat of arms in its center. The upper hoist-side and lower fly-side rectangles are blue and the lower hoist-side and upper fly-side rectangles are red.
The flag of Argentina features three equal horizontal bands of light blue, white and light blue. A brown-edged golden sun is centered in the white band.

The flag of the Turks and Caicos Islands is blue with the UK flag in the canton and the colonial shield centered on the fly half. The shield is yellow and displays a conch shell, a spiny lobster, and a cactus.
The flag of Russia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of white, blue and red.

The flag of Vanuatu is composed of two equal horizontal bands of red and green, with a black isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width of the field and is enclosed on its sides by the arms of a thin black-edged yellow horizontally oriented Y-shaped band which extends along the boundary of the red and green bands to the fly end of the field. A yellow boar's tusk encircling two yellow crossed namele leaves is centered in the triangle.
The flag of Mexico is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, white and red, with the national coat of arms centered in the white band.

The flag of Brunei has a yellow field with two adjoining diagonal bands of white and black that extend from the upper hoist side of the field to the lower fly side. The red emblem of Brunei is centered on the field.

name.official: Nation of Brunei, Abode of Peace

flags.alt: The flag of French Guiana divides diagonally with green in the upper fly and yellow in the lower hoist and bears a red five-pointed star in the center.
The flag of Mauritius is composed of four equal horizontal bands of red, blue, yellow and green.

The flag of Belarus features a vertical band, with a white and red ornamental pattern, spanning about one-fifth the width of the field on the hoist side. Adjoining the vertical band are two horizontal bands of red and green, with the red band twice the height of the green band.

The flag of Mauritania has a green field with a thin red horizontal band at the top and bottom of the field. At the center of the field is a five-pointed yellow star above an upward facing yellow crescent.

The flag of Turkmenistan has a green field. It features a red vertical band, bearing five carpet guls stacked above two crossed olive branches, near the hoist end of the field. Just to the fly side of the vertical band near the top edge of the field is a hoist-side facing white crescent and five small five-pointed white stars placed just outside the crescent opening.

The flag of Paraguay features three equal horizontal bands of red, white and blue, with an emblem centered in the white band. On the obverse side of the flag depicted, this emblem is the national coat of arms.

The flag of Czechia is composed of two equal horizontal bands of white and red, with a blue isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. The triangle has its base on the hoist end and spans about two-fifth the width of the field.

The flag of Sri Lanka features two large adjacent but separate rectangular areas, centered on a golden-yellow field. The smaller hoist-side rectangle is divided into two equal vertical bands of teal and orange, and the larger fly-side rectangle is maroon with a centered golden-yellow lion holding a Kastane sword in its right fore-paw and four golden-yellow Bo leaves, one in each corner.

name.official: Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka

flags.alt: The flag of Nigeria is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, white and green.
The flag of Palau has a light blue field with a large golden-yellow circle that is offset slightly towards the hoist side of center.
The flag of Kyrgyzstan features a yellow sun with forty rays at the center of a red field. At the center of the sun is a stylized depiction of a tunduk.
The flag of Tunisia has a red field. A white circle bearing a five-pointed red star within a fly-side facing red crescent is situated at the center of the field.
The flag of Guadeloupe has a black field with a 30-rayed yellow sun in front of a green sugarcane, as well as a blue stripe with three yellow fleurs-de-lis on the top.

The flag of Kiribati is divided into two halves. While the upper half has a red field, at the center of which is a yellow frigate bird flying over the top half of a rising yellow sun with seventeen visible rays, the lower half is composed of six horizontal wavy bands of white alternating with blue to depict the ocean.

name.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

eng.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

flags.alt: The flag of Fiji has a light blue field. It features the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton and the shield of the national coat of arms centered in the fly half.
The flag of Andorra features three equal vertical bands of blue, yellow and red, with the coat of arms of Andorra centered in the yellow band.
The flag of Antarctica features a plain white map of the country on a blue background.

The flag of Marshall Islands has a blue field with two broadening adjacent diagonal bands of orange and white that extend from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. A large white star with twenty-four rays — four large rays at the cardinal points and twenty smaller rays — is situated in the upper hoist-side corner above the diagonal bands.
The flag of China has a red field. In the canton are five yellow five-pointed stars — a large star and four smaller stars arranged in a vertical arc on the fly side of the large star.
The flag of Croatia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, white and blue, with the coat of arms of Croatia superimposed in the center.
The flag of Seychelles is composed of five broadening oblique bands of blue, yellow, red, white and green, which extend from the hoist side of the bottom edge to the top and fly edges of the field.

The flag of South Africa is composed of two equal horizontal bands of red and blue, with a yellow-edged black isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base centered on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width and two-third the height of the field, and is enclosed on its sides by the arms of a white-edged green horizontally oriented Y-shaped band which extends along the boundary of the red and blue bands to the fly end of the field.
The flag of the Cook Islands is blue with the UK flag in the canton and a large circle of 15 white five-pointed stars centered in the fly.

The flag of Spain is composed of three horizontal bands of red, yellow and red, with the yellow band twice the height of the red bands. In the yellow band is the national coat of arms offset slightly towards the hoist side of center.
The flag of Greenland has two equal horizontal bands of white and red, with a large disk slightly to the hoist side of center. The top half of the disk is red, and the bottom half is white.

The flag of Papua New Guinea is divided diagonally, from the upper hoist-side corner to the lower fly-side corner, into a lower black and an upper red triangle. On the hoist side of the lower black triangle is a representation of the Southern Cross constellation made up of one small and four larger five-pointed white stars. A golden Raggiana bird-of-paradise is situated on the fly side of the upper red triangle.

name.official: Independent State of Papua New Guinea

eng.official: Independent State of Papua New Guinea

flags.alt: The flag of Antigua and Barbuda has a red field with an inverted isosceles triangle based on the top edge and spanning the height of the field. This triangle has three horizontal bands of black, light blue and white, with the light blue band half the height of the two other bands. The top half of a golden-yellow sun is situated in the lower two-third of the black band to depict a rising sun.
The flag of Norway has a red field with a large white-edged navy blue cross that extends to the edges of the field. The vertical part of this cross is offset towards the hoist side.
The flag of Switzerland is square shaped. It features a white Swiss cross centered on a red field.

The flag of Zimbabwe is composed of seven equal horizontal bands of green, yellow, red, black, red, yellow and green, with a white isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle is edged in black, spans about one-fourth the width of the field and has its base on the hoist end. A yellow Zimbabwe Bird superimposed on a five-pointed red star is centered in the triangle.

The flag of Slovenia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of white, blue and red. The national coat of arms is situated in the upper hoist side of the field centered on the boundary between the white and blue bands.
The flag of Gabon is composed of three equal horizontal bands of green, yellow and blue.
The flag of the Faroe Islands is white with a red cross outlined in blue extending to the edges of the flag. The vertical part of the cross is shifted toward the hoist side.
The flag of Morocco features a green pentagram — a five-pointed linear star — centered on a red field.
The flag of Monaco is composed of two equal horizontal bands of red and white.
The flag of Lesotho is composed of three horizontal bands of blue, white and green in the ratio of 3:4:3. A black mokorotlo — a Basotho hat — is centered in the white band.

The flag of Wallis and Futuna has a red field with four white isosceles triangles in the middle. The apexes of the triangles are oriented inward and at right angles to each other. The flag of France, outlined in white on two sides, is in the canton.

name.official: Territory of the Wallis and Futuna Islands

fra.official: Territoire des îles Wallis et Futuna

flags.alt: The flag of Aruba is blue, with two narrow, horizontal yellow stripes across the lower portion and a red four-pointed star outlined in white in the canton.
The flag of Burkina Faso features two equal horizontal bands of red and green, with a yellow five-pointed star in the center.

The flag of Burundi is divided by a white diagonal cross into four alternating triangular areas of red at the top and bottom, and green on the hoist and fly sides. A white circle, with three green-edged red six-pointed stars arranged to form a triangle, is superimposed at the center of the cross.
The flag of Finland has a white field with a large blue cross that extend to the edges of the field. The vertical part of this cross is offset towards the hoist side.

The flag of Tajikistan is composed of three horizontal bands of red, white and green in the ratio of 2:3:2. A golden-yellow crown surmounted by an arc of seven five-pointed golden-yellow stars is centered in the white band.

The flag of Ecuador is composed of the horizontal bands of yellow, blue and red, with the yellow band twice the height of the other two bands. The Ecuadorian coat of arms is superimposed in the center of the field.
The flag of Italy is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, white and red.
The flag of Myanmar is composed of three equal horizontal bands of yellow, green and red, with a large five-pointed white star superimposed at the center of the field.

name.official: Republic of the Union of Myanmar

mya.official: ပြည်ထောင်စု သမ္မတ မြန်မာနိုင်ငံတော်

flags.alt: The flag of Japan features a crimson-red circle at the center of a white field.

The flag of South Sudan is composed of three equal horizontal bands of black, red with white top and bottom edges, and green. A blue equilateral triangle which spans about two-fifth the width of the field is superimposed on the hoist side with its base on the hoist end of the field. At the center of this triangle is a five-pointed yellow star.
The flag of Liberia is composed of eleven equal horizontal bands of red alternating with white. A blue square bearing a five-pointed white star is superimposed in the canton.

The flag of South Georgia is blue with the UK flag in the canton. The national coat of arms is centered on the fly half and has a green shield with a golden lion holding a torch. A fur seal is to the left of the shield and a Macaroni penguin to the right. A reindeer appears above the crest, and below the shield on a scroll is the Latin motto "LEO TERRAM PROPRIAM PROTEGAT" (Let the Lion Protect its Own Land).

name.official: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

eng.official: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

flags.alt: The flag of Bolivia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, yellow and green, with the national coat of arms centered in the yellow band.
The flag of Samoa has a red field. A blue rectangle, bearing a representation of the Southern Cross made up of five large and one smaller five-pointed white stars, is superimposed in the canton.
The flag of Vietnam features a large five-pointed yellow star on a red field.

vie.official: Cộng hòa xã hội chủ nghĩa Việt Nam

flags.alt: The flag of the Republic of the Congo features a yellow diagonal band that extends from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. Above and beneath this band are a green and red triangle respectively.

The flag of Iran is composed of three equal horizontal bands of green, white and red. A red emblem of Iran is centered in the white band and Arabic inscriptions in white span the bottom edge of the green band and the top edge of the red band.

The flag of the French Southern and Antarctic Lands is blue and features the French tricolor in the canton, often displayed with a white border. In the lower fly, the letters T.A.A.F. form a monogram in white, which is stylized to resemble an anchor. The monogram is surrounded by five white stars.

name.official: Territory of the French Southern and Antarctic Lands

fra.official: Territoire des Terres australes et antarctiques françaises

flags.alt: The flag of Réunion has a blue field, with a red triangle spanning the bottom and extending to the center, as well as five yellow beams emanating from the center, spread equally apart.
The flag of Lebanon is composed of three horizontal bands of red, white and red. The white band is twice the height of the red bands and bears a green Lebanese Cedar tree at its center.
The flag of American Samoa features a large white triangle edged in red that is based on the fly side and extends to the hoist side and is charged with an eagle, all on a blue field.
The flag of Cameroon is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, red and yellow, with a yellow five-pointed star in the center.
The flag of Senegal is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, golden-yellow and red, with a five-pointed green star centered in the golden-yellow band.
The flag of Macau is green with a lotus flower above a stylized bridge and water in white, under an arc of five five-pointed gold stars.

name.official: Macao Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China

por.official: Região Administrativa Especial de Macau da República Popular da China

zho.official: 中华人民共和国澳门特别行政区

flags.alt: The flag of Palestine has three equal horizontal stripes of black, white, and green overlaid by a red triangle issuing from the hoist.
The flag of Nauru has a dark blue field with a thin yellow horizontal band across the center and a large white twelve-pointed star beneath the horizontal band on the hoist side of the field.
The flag of San Marino is composed of two equal horizontal bands of white and light blue, with the national coat of arms superimposed in the center.

The flag of Solomon Islands features a thin yellow diagonal band that extends from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. Above and beneath this band are a blue and green triangle respectively. Five white five-pointed stars arranged in an X shape are situated on the hoist side of the upper blue triangle.

The flag of Anguilla is blue, with the flag of the UK in the canton and the national coat of arms centered in the fly half. The coat of arms depicts three orange dolphins in an interlocking circular design on a white background with a turquoise-blue field below.
The flag of Micronesia has a light blue field, at the center of which are four five-pointed white stars arranged in the shape of a diamond.
The flag of Malawi is composed of three equal horizontal bands of black, red and green. The top half of a red sun with thirty-one visible rays is centered in the black band.

nya.official: Chalo cha Malawi, Dziko la Malaŵi

flags.alt: The flag of Qatar has a maroon field, on the hoist side of which is a white vertical band that spans about one-third the width of the field and is separated from the rest of the field by nine adjoining fly-side pointing white isosceles triangles that serve as a serrated line.
The flag of Botswana has a light blue field with a white-edged black horizontal band across its center.
The flag of the Northern Mariana Islands is blue with a five-pointed white star on a gray latte stone (a traditional foundation stone) in the center, surrounded by a head lei (wreath).

name.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

cal.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

eng.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

flags.alt: The flag of Iceland has a blue field with a large white-edged red cross that extends to the edges of the field. The vertical part of this cross is offset towards the hoist side.

The flag of Kenya is composed of three equal horizontal bands of black, red with white top and bottom edges, and green. An emblem comprising a red, black and white Maasai shield covering two crossed white spears is superimposed at the center of the field.
The flag of Kosovo has a dark blue field with a gold-colored silhouette of the country in the center, with six five-pointed white stars in a slight arc over it.

The flag of Sint Maarten features two equal horizontal bands of red and blue, with a white isosceles triangle based on the hoist side. The center of the triangle displays the national coat of arms with an orange-bordered blue shield that prominently displays a white courthouse, as well as yellow sage in the upper left and the silhouette of a monument in the upper right. Over the shield is a yellow rising sun and a brown pelican in flight. A yellow scroll below the shield has the Latin motto "SEMPER PROGREDIENS" (Always Progressing).

The flag of the Bahamas is composed of three equal horizontal bands of aquamarine, yellow and aquamarine, with a black equilateral triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end and spans about one-third the width of the field.
The flag of Algeria features two equal vertical bands of green and white. A five-pointed red star within a fly-side facing red crescent is centered over the two-color boundary.
The flag of Greece is composed of nine equal horizontal bands of blue alternating with white. A blue square bearing a white cross is superimposed in the canton.

The flag of Nepal is the world's only non-quadrilateral flag of a sovereign country. It takes the shape of two adjoining right-angled triangles and has a crimson red field with deep blue edges. Within the smaller upper triangle is an emblem of the upper half of a white sun resting on an upward facing white crescent. The lower triangle bears a white sun with twelve rays.

The flag of the United States Virgin Islands is composed of a white field with the national coat of arms in the center between the large blue initials V and I. The coat of arms shows a yellow eagle holding an olive branch in its right talon and three arrows in the left, with a shield of seven red and six white vertical stripes below a blue panel.

name.official: Virgin Islands of the United States

eng.official: Virgin Islands of the United States
